scene.description: Moomin Valley at golden hour. All the familiar landmarks visible — the house, the river, the bridge, the mountains, the sea.

sentences.japanese: 雲 が ある。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomin Valley at golden hour. All familiar landmarks visible — house, river, bridge, mountains, sea. Clouds drift overhead! White and gold clouds float across the wide sky. Valley panorama with clouds. Wide shot, eye-level. Golden hour light, panoramic beauty mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 雲 の なか に はいった。
sentences.imagePrompt: The group has climbed to the hilltop and a low cloud envelops them. We went into the cloud! Golden sunlight filters through the mist, softly illuminating their faces. Moomintroll reaches out, watching his hand disappear into white. Group in golden mist on hilltop. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm golden light filtering through white mist, cloud immersion mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: あの 雲 は おおきい。
sentences.imagePrompt: Looking out from the hilltop, a massive cloud formation towers over the valley. That cloud is big! It catches the golden sunlight on its billowing surface. Stunning and vast. Towering cloud over the valley. Wide shot, eye-level. Dramatic golden light, magnificent scale mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 夢 を みた。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll sits on the hilltop remembering a dream from last night. I had a dream! In it the valley was full of strange colorful creatures. The golden light makes it feel dreamlike. Moomintroll reminiscing on hilltop. Medium shot, eye-level. Dreamy golden light, remembering dreams mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: いい 夢 だった。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll smiles at the memory. It was a good dream! The valley below matches his dream's beauty. Flowers bloom everywhere. Golden light on blooming valley. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm happy golden light, pleasant memory mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 夢 みたい な 場所 だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: The hilltop view is breathtaking — the whole valley glows at golden hour. This is a dreamlike place! Everything looks magical. The group sits together taking it in. Group on hilltop overlooking valley. Wide shot, eye-level. Magical golden light, dreamlike reality mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 春 が きた。
sentences.imagePrompt: Trees are in full bloom, flowers carpet the meadows, the river sparkles. Spring has come! The valley is alive with new growth. Birds circle overhead. Blooming spring valley. Wide shot, eye-level. Vibrant golden spring light, seasonal arrival mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 一番 いい の は 春 だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: Snufkin breathes in the warm spring air. Spring is the best! The season of travel and new beginnings. He looks content and free. Snufkin breathing spring air. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm perfect spring light, seasonal perfection mood.
sentences.speaker: スナフキン

sentences.japanese: 春 の 風 を 感じた。
sentences.imagePrompt: A warm spring breeze ruffles everyone's fur and hair. A spring wind is blowing! Cherry blossom petals dance in the air. Scarves flutter gently. Group in a spring breeze. Medium shot, eye-level. Soft flowing golden light, gentle wind mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: あの こと を 思い出した。
sentences.imagePrompt: Papa suddenly remembers an adventure from long ago. I remembered that thing! His eyes light up with the memory. The golden valley triggers nostalgia. Papa remembering with bright eyes. Medium close-up, eye-level. Warm nostalgic golden light, sudden memory mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 思い出す の が 楽しい ね。
sentences.imagePrompt: Everyone starts sharing memories of past adventures. Remembering is fun! They laugh and point at places in the valley below — there is where the Groke came, there is where they found the ruby. Group sharing memories. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm happy golden light, collective nostalgia mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: いい こと を 思い出した。
sentences.imagePrompt: Mama smiles, remembering the day the family first moved to Moomin Valley. I remembered something good! Her eyes shine with happy tears. The house is visible below, surrounded by garden. Mama with happy tears. Medium close-up, eye-level. Tender golden light, cherished memory mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 一番 いい もの だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll holds up the smooth stone from this morning and declares it the best treasure. This is the best thing! Better than rubies or gold. Simple and perfect. Moomintroll holding up a stone. Medium close-up, eye-level. Glowing golden light, declaring the best mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: ここ が 一番 いい。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll surveys the valley from the hilltop with deep contentment. I like this place the best! The whole valley stretches before him — home. Everything he loves is here. Moomintroll surveying the valley. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm devoted golden light, love of home mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 一番 楽しい 旅 だった。
sentences.imagePrompt: Papa reflects on all their adventures. It was the most fun trip! From storms to sunshine, caves to seas, every moment was worthwhile. The group nods in agreement. Papa reflecting with the group. Medium shot, eye-level. Rich golden light, reflective satisfaction mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: なに か が 浮いている。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll leans on the hilltop railing and spots something floating on the river below. Something is floating! A strange round object drifts on the current. Sunlight glints off it. Moomintroll looking at a floating object on the river. Medium shot, eye-level. Golden river-light, curiosity mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 雲 が 浮いている。
sentences.imagePrompt: The group gazes up at the sky from the hilltop. Clouds are floating! Vast white clouds drift serenely across the golden sky, their shadows passing slowly over the valley. Everything is peaceful. Group watching clouds from the hilltop. Wide shot, eye-level. Serene golden sky light, floating peace mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 水 に 浮いた。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll tosses a flower onto the river from the bridge below. It floated on the water! The flower drifts gently downstream, spinning slowly. A simple beautiful moment. Flower floating on the river. Medium close-up, eye-level. Warm golden water-light, floating beauty mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: 物語 を きいた。
sentences.imagePrompt: The group sits together on the hilltop as Papa tells a story. They listened to a story! His voice carries over the valley. Everyone listens, rapt. The sun begins to descend. Papa telling a story on the hilltop. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm storytelling golden light, narrative gathering mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: いい 物語 だ ね。
sentences.imagePrompt: Everyone is captivated by Papa's tale. It is a good story! Even Little My listens without interrupting. The valley provides the perfect backdrop. Group listening intently. Medium shot, eye-level. Rich warm golden light, enthralled audience mood.
sentences.speaker: ミー

sentences.japanese: この 物語 は みんな の もの だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: Papa gestures to the whole group — this story belongs to all of them. This story is everyone's! Each person played a part. Their adventures together make the tale. Papa gesturing to the group. Medium-wide shot, eye-level. Inclusive golden light, shared ownership mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: ふざけた！
sentences.imagePrompt: Little My pushes Sniff's hat over his eyes for a joke. She joked around! Sniff stumbles blindly while everyone laughs. The golden light catches their laughter. My pranking Sniff. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright playful golden light, comic relief mood.
sentences.speaker: ミー

sentences.japanese: ふざける の は やめて。
sentences.imagePrompt: Sniff pouts and tells My to stop. Stop joking around! But he is trying not to laugh too. The mood is too good to stay angry. Sniff trying not to laugh. Medium close-up, eye-level. Warm amused golden light, playful protest mood.
sentences.speaker: スニフ

sentences.japanese: ふざけない で。
sentences.imagePrompt: Mama gently tells My to be kind, though she is smiling too. Do not joke around! But the warmth in her voice shows she does not really mind. The golden hour continues. Mama smiling while scolding. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm indulgent golden light, gentle scolding mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン

sentences.japanese: この 春 の 物語 は みんな の もの だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: The golden hour deepens over Moomin Valley. The spring story still continues! The house, the river, the bridge, the mountains — all glow in amber light. The adventure goes on. Everyone together, looking out over their home. Full valley panorama at golden hour. Wide shot, eye-level. Deep amber golden light, continuing story mood.
sentences.speaker: ムーミン
